3.summary: A site for managing exhibition spaces, artworks, and user information

4.name: Metaverse Platform
4.detail: This is a metaverse exhibition platform. Real-time updates of artwork information were achieved by connecting frontend and backend data. Performance optimization and responsive design were applied to ensure seamless user experience across different environments.
frontendTasks: Developed UI components and integrated APIs
Developed UI panels and controls on WebGL
Collaborated with LG 2023 HE DX Tech Fair to create exclusive screens and meet technical requirements
backendTasks: Implemented CRUD for posts using Controller and Service

5.name: Donimoni
5.summary: A financial education platform for teenagers
5.detail: A platform designed for both parents and children to promote financial education and healthy economic habits. The project involved end-to-end development, from data processing to UI design, ensuring seamless interaction between frontend and backend.
frontendTasks: Set up project structure and implemented common layouts and components
Designed page UI and integrated APIs
backendTasks: Created API documentation and extracted entities
Modeled database and implemented JPA relationships
Developed repository and performed JUnit testing
Implemented Service and Controller layers and tested with Postman
